Package org.ginsim.gui.graph

Interface GraphGUIListener<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - the graph
    V - the vertex
    E - the edge
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditPanel, MainFrame, PerturbationSelectionPanel, ReductionConfigSelectionPanel, RegulatoryAnimator
    public interface GraphGUIListener<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>
    Interface for objects which listen for Graph GUI events.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • graphChanged

        void graphChanged​(G g,
                  GraphChangeType type,
                  Object data)
        The graph data was changed. This method is used to forward change events (see GraphListener) to the GUI. Listeners should react by refreshing the GUI when needed but should not change the graph.
        Parameters:
        g - the graph
        type - the type
        data - object data
